Package com.APP.Project.UserInterface.models

Class PredefinedUserCommands

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserInterface.models.PredefinedUserCommands
public class PredefinedUserCommands extends Object
this provides a structure for predefined commands the user is supposed to enter
